name: Nafet's River -Demo
description:
Nafet’s River is an action river rafting game. After building rafts, players compete to outlast each other on the river.

  • Swing your axe at trees or at your pal
  • Upgrade your raft for better aquatic mobility
  • Dodge rocks and throw woodchips at your opponent

Nafet's River is still in development and will continue to receive updated demos for playtesting purposes up until it's TBD full release date. You can track the progress of Nafet's River on my devlog!

**This build is only compatible with Xbox controllers!** Support for other controllers & keyboard will come in a future update.
